sentences.en: Ba people originate from the ancestor of Linjun living in Wuyan.
sentences.cn: 巴人源流始于廪君之先,出自巫蜒.

sentences.en: By such deeds, you soil the very name the ancestor have bequeathed us.
sentences.cn: 你这样做, 玷污了祖宗们留给我们的名声.

sentences.en: From this union was born Aeneas, the mythical ancestor of the Roman people.
sentences.cn: 他们结合后生下艾尼阿斯, 他是神话中说的罗马人的祖先.

sentences.en: Her Chinese friends referred to the Empress as their venerable ancestor.
sentences.cn: 她的中国朋友们说这位女皇是他们值得敬仰的祖先。

sentences.en: It may help you when you become an ancestor yourself.
sentences.cn: 等你做了长辈,说不定有点用处.

sentences.en: Man was evolved from an ancestor that was probably arboreal.
sentences.cn: 人大概是从住在树上的祖先进化而来的.

sentences.en: The abacus is the ancestor of the modern computer.
sentences.cn: 算盘是现代电脑的原型.

sentences.en: The ancestor of the modern bicycle only be seen in the picture.
sentences.cn: 现代自行车的雏形只能从照片上看到了.

sentences.en: The ancestor of these miniature electronic devices is the vacuum tube.
sentences.cn: 这些微型电子装置的鼻祖就是真空管.

sentences.en: The direct ancestor of the modern cat was the Kaffir cat of ancient Egypt.
sentences.cn: 现代猫的直系原种是古埃及的卡菲尔猫。

sentences.en: The ideas behind this are probably very old, stemming from ancestor worship rather than Buddhism.
sentences.cn: 也许这种隐含的意思非常古老, 它起源于对祖先而不是佛教的崇拜.

sentences.en: The immediate ancestor of rock "n" roll is rhythm-and-blues.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐直接源自节奏布鲁斯。

sentences.en: This machine is the ancestor of the modern computer.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是现代电脑的始祖.

sentences.en: Yet, Proto - Indo - European is believed to be the ancestor of most European languages.
sentences.cn: 但是 印欧语 系被认为是大多数欧洲语言的祖先.

words.tran_cn: 女性祖先；女性被继承人

phrases.tran_cn: 祖先崇拜；祭祖；敬奉祖先

trans.tran_cn: 祖宗，祖先，（动物）原种，（机器）原型
trans.tran_en: a member of your family who lived a long time ago
